BRENDAN RODGERS takes his Celtic players to Ibrox this afternoon for the first Glasgow derby of the season. The champions won the corresponding fixture 3-0 at Parkhead last year and an action replay would be most welcome as the Hoops look to maintain their 100 per cent league record.
